attributes.action: Intervene and look at the legality of the Low Emmision Zone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow Ken Livingstone to restrict all vehicles older than 2001 or pay a daily charge to drive within the M25 and London is discriminatory.Why should we pay for bad emmisions on our lorries and vans when car owners do not have to? There are some cars that emmit more bad emmisions than vans.Van and Lorry drivers are not just to blame for high emmisions in London and within the M25 Why not just introduce tighter controls at the MOT stations? To just penalise us is discrimation surely
